welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Yerres, France! Get ready to experience the charming beauty and rich history of this city. From its picturesque parks to its cultural attractions and delicious cuisine, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that Yerres has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mainly serving domestic flights within France.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in certain areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals serving a mix of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mostly low-cost airlines and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but limited to 4 hours per day. Additional time can be purchased for a fee.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
